column2: Have NOT recruited this type of courtier within the last 2 weeks\n
§Y[This.GetBestName]§! will be released from prison and join my court.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will be released from prison and join my court.
This option is available because you are §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!
This option is available because you are §Y[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]§!
This option is available because your religion has the §YEnatic Clans§! doctrine
Age is greater or equal to §Y5§!
Is NOT a landed vassal of §Y[Prev.GetBestName]§!
Is NOT a landed vassal of §Y[Prev.TopLiege.GetBestName]§!
Does NOT publicly practice a religion in the §Y[From.Religion.GetGroupName]§! group
Is NOT in the §Y[From.Religion.GetGroupName]§! religion group
Does NOT have §Y[From.Culture.GetName]§! culture or is a §YKnown Murderer§!
Has a Trade Post belonging to §Y[From.GetBestName]§!
Enslaved men will not be castrated.

As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you may give the order to poison [Root.GetHerHim]. Thanks to the exotic poisons and toxins at your disposal, [Root.GetSheHe] will appear to have died a natural death.
As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your prisoner, you may spend the night in [Root.GetHerHis] cell, ensuring [Root.GetSheHe] isn't feeling lonely.
As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your slave, you may spend the night in [Root.GetHerHis] chambers, ensuring [Root.GetSheHe] isn't feeling lonely.
Invite a local §Y[Root.Location.Culture.GetName]§! villager of §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§! faith from [Root.GetName] to your court.
Pardon §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and employ [Root.GetHerHim] in your court.
Sell a prisoner into slavery for money.
Claim a prisoner as your slave.
Purchase a local §Y[Root.Location.Culture.GetName]§! slave of §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§! faith from [Root.GetName] to work in your court.
Offer a slave as a gift to §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!, for §G+15§! Opinion.
Slaves in your court can be forbidden from the right to marry.
Slaves in your court can be permitted the right to marry, if previously forbidden.
Castration of male slaves is commonly practiced by those of your culture or religion, and may be toggled on or off.
Castration of male slaves is commonly practiced by those of your culture or religion, and may be toggled on or off.

Guards brought poisoned food and wine to your prisoner as you instructed. Although [From.GetSheHe] seemed surprised to receive such a generous meal, hunger and thirst did their job—[From.GetSheHe] ate and drank everything delivered! It won't be long until [From.GetSheHe] drops dead.

Guards brought some food and wine to your cell and left. Even though it seems suspicious, you eagerly consume it all to try to sate your ravenous hunger. Falling asleep, you experience a strange feeling inside your stomach...
It was actually quite a delicious meal!
You slowly enter [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s cell and send the guards away. [From.GetSheHeCap] is sitting in front of you, eyes closed. [From.GetSheHeCap] knows that this night will be a long one.

Guards open the cell door, letting their liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] in. An ugly smile on [From.GetHerHis] face doesn't promise anything good and [From.GetHerHis] eyes are eating your chest. Something's not right...

You slowly enter [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s chambers and close the door behind you. [From.GetSheHeCap] looks at you and then turns [From.GetHerHis] head down, eyes fixed to the ground. [From.GetSheHeCap] knows that this night will be a long one.

The door to your chambers slowly creeks open, with [From.GetTitledFirstName] entering and shutting the door behind [From.GetHerHim]. An ugly smile on [From.GetHerHis] face doesn't promise anything good and [From.GetHerHis] eyes are eating your chest. Something's not right...
The [mta_settlement_root.Location.Culture.GetName] commoner who you decide to invite to your court is...
From taking slaves, you've established a reputation for yourself as a known Slaver. If human property is to be bought, you're certainly someone willing to sell.
I haven't even gotten started yet!

Enslaving so many people like cattle has earned you a reputation as a Notorious Slaver. Throughout the land, those who would speak against the terrible [Root.GetBestName] are warned to watch their back... lest they end up in chains and on display at a market.

You meet with a respected [mta_settlement_root.Location.Culture.GetName] slave trader in the markets of [mta_settlement_root.Location.Capital.GetName], looking to make a purchase. "[mta_settlement_root.Location.MTA_GetRelGreeting], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. There is a variety of wares I can offer. First, to narrow it down, do you require a male or female slave? Or do you already have a specific request in mind?"
I have a special, more specific request.
On second thought, I don't need a slave.
You will be able to choose the slave's area of expertise.
You will go back to the start of the transaction.
The slaver smiles, eagerly looking to finalize the deal. "Of course, a male slave it is. Now, what skills would you prefer for him to have? I have a few options available for you to choose from..."
You will be able to choose whether to castrate him or not.

Nodding and resting his hand on a small, sickle-shaped curved knife on his belt, the slaver turns his head towards his former property and then back to you. "Very good. Would you like him castrated, my [Root.GetLordLady]? It will be quick and clean, I assure you, with no risk of damaging your new property."

Nodding and resting her hand on a small, sickle-shaped curved knife on her belt, the slaver turns her head towards her former property and then back to you. "Very good. Would you like him castrated, my [Root.GetLordLady]? It will be quick and clean, I assure you, with no risk of damaging your new property."
No, he's fine as he is.
The slaver smiles, eagerly looking to finalize the deal. "Of course, a female slave it is. Now, what skills would you prefer for her to have? I have a few options available for you to choose from..."
She must be trained in court intrigue.
The slaver raises his brow. "What is it that you have in mind, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
The slaver raises her brow. "What is it that you have in mind, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
I want a gladiator skilled in one-on-one combat.
He will have the §YDuelist§! trait and a higher chance of being competent.
I want a capable and trustworthy physician.
He will have the §YRenowned Physician§! trait and a higher chance of being competent.
She will have the §YRenowned Physician§! trait and a higher chance of being competent.
She will have the §YGroomed§! trait and a higher chance of being §YAttractive§! and competent.
He will have the §YGroomed§! trait and a higher chance of being §YAttractive§! and competent.
You will be able to choose a more specialized slave

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],

I humbly offer you this slave as a gift. I promise that [slave_sent.GetFullName] shall serve you well.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
To the [Root.GetBestName],\n\nThank you, but I have no need for [slave_sent.GetFullName].
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName],\n\nPeace be with you. I accept your gracious gift. [slave_sent.GetFullName] will serve splendidly!

Just as dinner is being served, [From.GetFirstName] accidentally drops my plate, shattering it to pieces and getting my food all over the floor! [From.GetSheHeCap]'s looking at me scared of how I might react, clearly knowing [From.GetSheHe] made a mistake. What will I ever do with someone so clumsy serving me?!
GET TO CLEANING THAT UP! NOW!!
Stop staring at me and clean that up already!
What a mess. Somebody help this [From.GetManWoman]!
You think you can get away with ruining MY dinner?!
[From.GetFirstName] hastily goes to clean up [From.GetHerHis] mess.
[From.GetFirstName] is relieved [From.GetSheHe] doesn't have to clean up [From.GetHerHis] mess alone.
[From.GetFirstName] is relieved by your patience and goes to clean up [From.GetHerHis] mess.
[From.GetFirstName] hurries in a panic to clean up [From.GetHerHis] mess.
[From.GetFirstName] fears what you might do to [From.GetHerHim]...

While getting something to drink from my cellar, I caught [From.GetFirstName] already half drunk and nervously trying to sneak away with a bottle of [Root.GetAlcohol]! [From.GetSheHeCap] must have taken it from my stock. A slave taking something belonging to their [Root.GetMasterMistress] without permission would be considered stealing by most.
Drinking alone?! Let's finish that bottle together!
Why don't you come finish it with me in my chambers...?
I'll let you go this time, but don't do this again.
Do you know what the punishment is for thievery?!
You intimately spend the night with [From.GetFirstName].

It sounds like two of my slaves are bickering with each other and don't realize I can hear them! [From.GetFirstName] is arguing with [slave_bickerer.GetFirstName] that [slave_bickerer.GetSheHe] is always given far less work compared to [From.GetHerHim], while [slave_bickerer.GetFirstName] says [From.GetFirstName] just doesn't even pay attention to half of what [slave_bickerer.GetSheHe] does.
There's no need to argue about who does what.
What do I care? Let them argue.
This character has established a reputation for practicing slavery.
This character has established quite the reputation among foreign realms for enslaving whomever they please like cattle.
This character is or was formerly a slave, and is looked down upon in the eyes of the nobility.
This character is a slave that has been forbidden the right to marriage by their [Liege.GetMasterMistress].
This character is of low birth and has had their status elevated by their liege, but this is seen as a breach of feudal contract by some and they are still seen as lesser in the eyes of the nobility.
This character has been enslaved and is excluded from inheritance. [Root.GetEnslavementLengthDesc]
Slavery is allowed for certain cultures, governments, religions, and doctrines (Civilized, Sons of Ragnarok, Totem Guardians, Bloodthirsty Gods, or Religious Tax).\n
Slavery is allowed for everyone regardless of culture, government, or religion.
§BMTA - Vice and Virtue§!: AI Slavery Rate
If slavery is enabled, the AI will use slavery decisions at the default rate.
If slavery is enabled, the AI will use slavery decisions at half the default rate.
If slavery is enabled, the AI will use slavery decisions at a quarter the default rate.
§BMTA - Vice and Virtue§!: Visit in Chambers
Rulers may forcibly spend the night with their prisoners and slaves.\n
Forcibly spending the night with prisoners and slaves is disabled.\n
Rulers can invite lowborn characters from counties in their realm to their court. Peasant leaders can be pardoned.\n
Rulers can invite lowborn characters from counties in their realm to their court. but peasant leaders cannot be pardoned.\n
Inviting lowborn characters from realm counties and pardoning peasant leaders is disabled.\n
